title: Sample, ca. 1948
medium:
Medium: synthetic
Technique: 2/2 twill plain weave
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 19 x 19 cm (7 1/2 x 7 1/2 in.)
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy (Liebes) Morin
description: Heavy twill in green and orange. Warp is green boucle alternating with green 2-ply yarn. Weft is a repeating sequence of orange chenille, orange smooth yarn, and yellow boucle with flat brown plastic.
